title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated OIDC guide to use `ACTIONS_ID_TOKEN_REQUEST_TOKEN` instead of `ACTIONS_RUNTIME_TOKEN`.
Added new audit log events for billing budgets, Azure subscriptions, Copilot configurations, issue dependencies, repository settings, team management, social identities, and sub-issues.
Updated existing audit log events with improved descriptions and fields.
Added OpenVSX Access Token to secret scanning patterns.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated OIDC guide to use `ACTIONS_ID_TOKEN_REQUEST_TOKEN` instead of `ACTIONS_RUNTIME_TOKEN`.
- Added new audit log events for billing budgets, Azure subscriptions, Copilot configurations, issue dependencies, repository settings, team management, social identities, and sub-issues.
- Updated existing audit log events with improved descriptions and fields.
- Added OpenVSX Access Token to secret scanning patterns.
